item.title: 阿根廷米莱公司将对核电站运营商实行部分私有化
item.description: 阿根廷总统发言人曼努埃尔-阿多尼（Manuel Adorni）周二表示，阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）将签署一项法令，对阿根廷核电公司（Nucleoelectrica Argentina）进行部分私有化。【原文：Argentine President Javier Milei will sign a decree to partially privatize Nucleoelectrica Argentina, the company operating the country's three functioning nuclear power plants, presidential spokesman Manuel Adorni said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 印度称与美国的贸易讨论 "积极"、"具有前瞻性
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普因印度购买俄罗斯石油而对其征收惩罚性关税之后，新德里表示，印度和美国官员周二进行的贸易讨论是 "积极的 "和 "前瞻性的"。【原文：Trade discussions between Indian and U.S. officials on Tuesday were "positive" and "forward-looking", New Delhi said, after President Donald Trump struck a more conciliatory tone following punitive tariffs on India over its Russian oil purchases.】

item.title: 加航称空乘人员工会要求取消调解
item.description: 加拿大航空公司（Air Canada）周二表示，在本月早些时候会员投票反对工资协议后，代表其空乘人员的工会要求取消调解。【原文：Air Canada said on Tuesday the union representing its flight attendants has requested a cancellation of mediation after members voted against a wage agreement earlier this month.】

item.title: 美国将考虑对汽车零部件征收新的国家安全关税
item.description: 美国商务部周二表示，以国家安全为由，将在未来几周内考虑对更多进口汽车零部件征收关税的行业请求。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department said Tuesday it will consider industry requests to impose tariffs on additional imported auto parts in the coming weeks on national security grounds.】

item.title: 雪佛龙公司、以色列管道运营商将启动通往埃及的新天然气管道
item.description: 美国雪佛龙公司（Chevron）周二表示，该公司与以色列国有管道运营商签署了一项协议，将启动尼扎纳天然气管道的建设，把利维坦气田的天然气输送到埃及。【原文：Chevron signed a deal with Israel's state-owned pipeline operator to kickstart construction of the Nitzana natural gas pipeline to transport gas from the Leviathan gasfield to Egypt, the U.S. company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 为应对关税，礼来公司将投资 50 亿美元在弗吉尼亚州新建工厂
item.description: 礼来公司周二表示，它将投资 50 亿美元在弗吉尼亚州建造一座生产厂，这是该制药商计划在美国新建的四座工厂中的第一座，因为它将扩大国内生产，并对冲潜在的关税。【原文：Eli Lilly said on Tuesday it will invest $5 billion to build a manufacturing facility in Virginia, the first of four new U.S. plants the drugmaker has planned as it moves to expand domestic production and hedge against potential tariffs.】

item.title: MGX 与银湖共同投资收购 Altera
item.description: 阿布扎比人工智能投资公司、银湖（Silver Lake）的合作伙伴 MGX 周二表示，它已加入收购集团，收购了加州可编程芯片公司 Altera 的多数股权，英特尔只持有其 49% 的股份。【原文：MGX, an Abu Dhabi artificial intelligence investment firm and partner of Silver Lake, said on Tuesday it has joined the buyout group in acquiring a majority stake in California programmable chip business Altera, leaving Intel with a 49% holding.】

item.title: 美国 7 月商业库存温和增长
item.description: 政府数据显示，在销售激增的情况下，7 月份美国企业库存略有增加。【原文：U.S. business inventories increased marginally in July amid a surge in sales, government data showed.】

item.title: 汽车产量反弹，美国制造业产出意外增长
item.description: 尽管关税继续给制造业蒙上阴影，但由于汽车和一些非耐用品的产量回升，8月份美国工厂生产意外增长。【原文：U.S. factory production unexpectedly increased in August amid a rebound in the output of motor vehicles and some nondurable goods, though tariffs continued to cast a shadow over the manufacturing sector.】

item.title: 迪士尼、环球、华纳兄弟发现公司起诉中国 MiniMax 侵犯版权
item.description: 华特迪士尼、康卡斯特旗下的环球影业和华纳兄弟发现公司联合对中国 MiniMax 提起版权诉讼，称其图像和视频生成服务海洛 AI 是盗用了好莱坞三大电影公司的知识产权。【原文：Walt Disney , Comcast's Universal and Warner Bros Discovery have jointly filed a copyright lawsuit against China's MiniMax alleging that its image- and video-generating service Hailuo AI was built from intellectual property stolen from the three major Hollywood studios.】

item.title: 巴西财政部长认为未来几个月将降息
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）周二表示，他预计未来几个月将开始降息，理由是拉丁美洲最大经济体的外汇前景更加有利。【原文：Brazilian Finance Minister Fernando Haddad said on Tuesday he expects interest rate cuts to begin in the coming months, citing a more favorable foreign exchange outlook in Latin America's largest economy.】

item.title: 以色列网络安全初创公司 Vega 融资 6500 万美元，估值 4 亿美元
item.description: 以色列网络安全初创公司 Vega 周二表示，该公司已在早期融资中筹集了 6500 万美元，估值达 4 亿美元。【原文：Israeli cybersecurity startup Vega said on Tuesday it had raised $65 million in early-stage financing rounds that valued it at $400 million.】

item.title: 瑞士银行声称首次使用公共区块链进行有约束力的支付
item.description: 瑞士银行家协会（SBA）周二表示，包括瑞银在内的三家瑞士银行首次使用银行存款和公共区块链进行了绑定支付。【原文：Three Swiss banks, including UBS , have carried out a binding payment using bank deposits and a public blockchain for the first time, the Swiss Bankers Association (SBA) said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国已为 TikTok 找到买家
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二表示，美国和中国已达成协议，短视频应用TikTok将继续在美国运营，其美国资产将从中国的字节跳动公司（ByteDance）移交给美国所有者，从而可能解决萦绕近一年的争议。【原文：President Donald Trump said on Tuesday that the U.S. and China have a deal that will keep the short-video app TikTok operating in the United States, transferring its U.S. assets to U.S. owners from China's ByteDance, potentially resolving a saga that has lingered for nearly a year.】

item.title: 消息人士称欧佩克+官员将在维也纳讨论产能问题
item.description: 两名代表周二告诉路透社，欧佩克+代表计划于周四和周五在维也纳举行会议，讨论由 22 个成员国组成的生产国集团最大生产能力的评估方法。【原文：OPEC+ delegates are planning to meet in Vienna on Thursday and Friday to discuss the methodology for assessing maximum production capacities for the 22-member producer group, two delegates told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 图：最新一轮融资估值 390 亿美元
item.description: 人工智能机器人公司Figure周二表示，该公司在最新一轮融资中获得了超过10亿美元的承诺资金，融资后公司估值达390亿美元。【原文：AI robotics company Figure said on Tuesday it had received over $1 billion in committed capital in its latest funding round that valued the firm at $39 billion post money.】

item.title: 亚马逊拉拢费伊，在远程医疗平台上提供营养师服务
item.description: 亚马逊周二表示，已与 Fay 合作，通过这家电子商务巨头的数字健康平台提供个性化的、保险范围内的营养师服务。【原文：Amazon has teamed up with Fay to provide personalized, insurance-covered dietitian services through the e-commerce giant's digital health platform, the nutrition care startup said on Tuesday.】

item.title: Workday 将以 11 亿美元收购人工智能公司 Sana
item.description: 人力资源软件供应商 Workday 周二表示，将以约 11 亿美元的价格收购人工智能公司 Sana。【原文：Human resources software provider Workday said on Tuesday it would acquire artificial intelligence firm Sana for about $1.1 billion.】

item.title: 美国 8 月份资本和消费品进口价格上涨
item.description: 受资本和消费品成本大幅上涨的推动，8月份美国进口价格意外上涨，这表明未来几个月国内通胀有望加速。【原文：U.S. import prices unexpectedly rose in August, boosted by strong increases in the costs of capital and consumer goods, suggesting domestic inflation was poised to accelerate in the coming months.】

item.title: 高利率扼杀需求，美国房地产市场仍将陷入困境
item.description: 路透社对房地产专家进行的一项调查显示，由于高抵押贷款利率抑制了需求，美国低迷的房地产市场到明年仍将持续疲软，预计到2027年才会出现小幅反弹。【原文：The United States' sluggish housing market will remain weak through next year as high mortgage rates stifle demand with only a modest rebound expected in 2027, a Reuters survey of property experts showed.】

item.title: 美国 8 月零售销售超预期；劳动力市场疲软令前景黯淡
item.description: 美国 8 月份零售额增幅超过预期，但在劳动力市场疲软和进口关税导致商品价格上涨的情况下，增长势头可能会有所缓解。【原文：U.S. retail sales increased more than expected in August, but momentum could ease amid labor market weakness and rising goods prices because of tariffs on imports.】

item.title: 网络安全公司 Netskope 提高首次公开募股价格区间，估值达 73 亿美元
item.description: 网络安全公司Netskope周二表示，在上调了首次公开募股的价格区间后，该公司目前的目标是在美国首次公开募股中获得高达72.6亿美元的估值，这凸显了投资者对高增长科技股的追捧。【原文：Cybersecurity firm Netskope is now aiming for a valuation of up to $7.26 billion in its U.S. initial public offering after raising the proposed price range, it said on Tuesday, underscoring investor appetite for high-growth tech stocks.】

item.title: 马耳他金融监管机构反对推动欧盟加密货币监管集中化
item.description: 马耳他金融监管局发言人周二表示，该局反对其他国家推动赋予欧盟证券监管机构更多权力来监管加密货币公司。【原文：Malta's financial watchdog is opposed to a push by other countries to give the European Union's securities regulator more powers to supervise crypto companies, a spokesperson said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国称查理-贾维斯因诈骗摩根大通应被判 12 年监禁
item.description: 美国检察官表示，因诈骗摩根大通以 1.75 亿美元收购其大学财务援助初创公司 Frank 而被定罪的企业家查理-贾维斯（Charlie Javice）应因其罪行在监狱服刑 12 年。【原文：Charlie Javice, the entrepreneur convicted for defrauding JPMorgan Chase into buying her college financial aid startup Frank for $175 million, should spend 12 years in prison for her crimes, U.S. prosecutors said.】

item.title: Salesforce 预测：随着购物者紧缩预算，美国在线假日销售将放缓
item.description: 根据 Salesforce 周二发布的预测，2025 年假日季美国网上销售额的增长预计将比去年放缓，因为在生活成本上升的情况下，注重价格的购物者会继续挑剔消费。【原文：U.S. online sales growth during the 2025 holiday season is expected to slow from last year, as price-conscious shoppers stay picky with their spending amid rising living costs, according to a Salesforce forecast released on Tuesday.】

item.title: 白宫表示，特朗普政府将对法院阻止解雇美联储理事库克的裁决提起上诉
item.description: 白宫周二表示，特朗普政府将对法院阻止唐纳德-特朗普总统解雇美联储理事丽莎-库克的决定提出上诉。【原文：The Trump administration will appeal the court decision blocking President Donald Trump's bid to fire Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook, the White House said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 报告显示，美国消费者正感受到通胀和利率带来的压力
item.description: 美国信用评分公司费尔-艾萨克公司（Fair Isaac Corporation）周二表示，由于通货膨胀和利率上调影响了借款人的经济承受能力，导致借款人的经济压力增大，一些美国消费者正显示出越来越多的压力迹象。【原文：Some U.S. consumers are showing increased signs of stress as inflation and higher interest rates are affecting affordability and leading to financial strain on borrowers, credit scoring company Fair Isaac Corporation , widely known as FICO, said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普与习近平会谈后，美国财长预计将达成最终嘀嗒协议
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周二表示，他预计美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五与中国领导人习近平通话时将就短视频应用 TikTok 达成最终协议。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Tuesday he anticipated a final deal on the short-video app TikTok when President Donald Trump speaks with Chinese leader Xi Jinping on Friday.】

item.title: 国防部长称丹麦可能购买波音飞机用于北极监控
item.description: 丹麦国防部长周二表示，丹麦军方可能会购买一支波音 P-8 潜艇猎杀海上巡逻机机队，以帮助加强对法罗群岛和格陵兰岛的监视。【原文：Denmark's defence minister said on Tuesday the country's military may buy a fleet of Boeing P-8 submarine-hunting maritime patrol aircraft to help boost the surveillance of the Faroe Islands and Greenland.】

item.title: 美国财长贝森特在美联储主席人选中称赞布拉德
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周二表示，他与前美联储官员詹姆斯-布拉德（James Bullard）进行了一次很好的会谈，这是他寻找美联储新主席的工作之一。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Tuesday he had a good session with former Fed official James Bullard as part of his search for a new Fed chairman.】
